name: Connected in code
description:
Hell'O!

This is not fully a game, more like just a proof of concept. I did struggle with this years theme and really have no passion left this weekend. But in the end I come up with idea that I think I did not see anywhere else. Maybe one day I will make it into full game.

If you find this idea inspiring and decide to create your own game with similar mechanics, please leave me a message, because I would love to see someone more talented with more time do it better.

Controls:

  • Use "drag-and-drop" to connect bots and make them share their "code".
  • Click on the link to remove it.

Thank you for checking my little experiment and have a nice day.
